trans-unit.source: Finding the time zones defined on a local system
trans-unit.target: 查找本地系统上定义的时区

trans-unit.source: Finding the time zones defined on a local system
trans-unit.target: 查找本地系统上定义的时区

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET、.NET Core

trans-unit.source: Finding the time zones defined on a local system
trans-unit.target: 查找本地系统上定义的时区

trans-unit.source: The [System.TimeZoneInfo](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo) class does not expose a public constructor.
trans-unit.target: [System.TimeZoneInfo](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo) 类不公开公共构造函数。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the `new` keyword cannot be used to create a new [TimeZoneInfo](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo) object.
trans-unit.target: 因此，`new` 关键字不能用于创建新的 [TimeZoneInfo](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo) 对象。

trans-unit.source: Instead, [TimeZoneInfo](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo) objects are instantiated by retrieving information on predefined time zones from the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 相反，[TimeZoneInfo](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo) 对象通过检索操作系统上有关预定义时区的信息进行实例化。

trans-unit.source: This topic discusses instantiating a time zone from data stored by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 本主题讨论从操作系统存储的数据实例化时区。

trans-unit.source: In addition, `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) properties of the [TimeZoneInfo](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo) class provide access to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and the local time zone.
trans-unit.target: 此外，[TimeZoneInfo](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo) 类的 `static`（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Shared`）属性提供对协调世界时 (UTC) 和本地时区的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Accessing Individual Time Zones
trans-unit.target: 访问独立时区

trans-unit.source: The [TimeZoneInfo](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo) class provides two predefined time zone objects that represent the UTC time and the local time zone.
trans-unit.target: [TimeZoneInfo](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo) 类提供两个预定义时区对象，分别表示 UTC 时间和本地时区。

trans-unit.source: They are available from the [TimeZoneInfo.Utc](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Utc) and [TimeZoneInfo.Local](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local) properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 可分别从 [TimeZoneInfo.Utc](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Utc) 和 [TimeZoneInfo.Local](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local) 属性找到这两个对象。

trans-unit.source: For instructions on accessing the UTC or local time zones, see [How to: access the predefined UTC and local time zone objects](access-utc-and-local.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关访问 UTC 或本地时区的说明，请参阅[如何：访问预定义 UTC 和本地时区对象](access-utc-and-local.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can also instantiate a [TimeZoneInfo](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo) object that represents any time zone defined by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 还可以实例化表示任何由操作系统定义的时区的 [TimeZoneInfo](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo) 对象。

trans-unit.source: For instructions on instantiating a specific time zone object, see [How to: instantiate a TimeZoneInfo object](instantiate-time-zone-info.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关实例化特定时区对象的说明，请参阅[如何：实例化 TimeZoneInfo 对象](instantiate-time-zone-info.md)。

trans-unit.source: Time Zone Identifiers
trans-unit.target: 时区标识符

trans-unit.source: The time zone identifier is a key field that uniquely identifies the time zone.
trans-unit.target: 时区标识符是唯一标识时区的键字段。

trans-unit.source: While most keys are relatively short, the time zone identifier is comparatively long.
trans-unit.target: 虽然大多数键都相对较短，但时区标识符相对较长。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, its value corresponds to the [TimeZoneInfo.StandardName](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.StandardName) property, which is used to provide the name of the time zone's standard time.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，其值对应于 [TimeZoneInfo.StandardName](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.StandardName) 属性，该属性用于提供时区标准时间的名称。

trans-unit.source: However, there are exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 但是，有例外情况。

trans-unit.source: The best way to make sure that you supply a valid identifier is to enumerate the time zones available on your system and note their associated identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 确保提供有效标识符最好的办法是枚举系统上可用的时区，并记下其关联的标识符。

trans-unit.source: For instructions on enumerating time zones, see [How to: enumerate time zones present on a computer](enumerate-time-zones.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关枚举时区的说明，请参阅[如何：枚举计算机上存在的时区](enumerate-time-zones.md)。

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: 另请参阅

trans-unit.target: [日期、时间和时区](index.md)

trans-unit.target: [如何：枚举计算机上存在的时区](enumerate-time-zones.md)
